name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】 1st generation 7th anniversary♪♪ 【 #電脳ぴゅあ推し大宣言 】 [wrsUn4IQmZ0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs 'Sakura no Ato (all quartets lead to the?)'.
scenes.song_name: Sakura no Ato (all quartets lead to the?)

scenes.description: MC section where the 1st generation members discuss their solo performances and introduce the next segment.
The members of Hololive 1st Generation perform 'Killer Tune'.

subtitles.original: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...
subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...

subtitles.original: 桜が 桜が
subtitles.english: Sakura, sakura

subtitles.original: 咲いて散ったその後で 何が真実なのかは
subtitles.english: After blooming and falling, what is the truth?

subtitles.original: わかるから future melody さあ 今は奏でて
subtitles.english: I'll know, so future melody, come on, play it now

subtitles.original: 世界救うだなんて 僕は信じてないけどね
subtitles.english: Saving the world, I don't believe in that

subtitles.original: 今 目の前の君が 明日を生きれるくらいには
subtitles.english: Just enough so that you, in front of me now, can live through tomorrow

subtitles.original: ありえない不条理は ぶっ飛ばしていけ
subtitles.english: Blow away the impossible absurdities

subtitles.original: with 喜怒哀楽 余すな全部 惜しみなく
subtitles.english: With joy, anger, sorrow, and pleasure, all of it without regret

subtitles.original: 言えないまま 飲み込むなんて事はよして
subtitles.english: Stop swallowing things without being able to say them

subtitles.original: with 喜怒哀楽 大丈夫さとどこまでも行くだろう
subtitles.english: With joy, anger, sorrow, and pleasure, we'll go anywhere saying it's okay

subtitles.original: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...
subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...

subtitles.original: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...
subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...

subtitles.original: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...
subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...

subtitles.original: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...
subtitles.english: All quartets lead, lead to...? Say la-la-la...

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ほいしょ。ということでソロパートでしたー！
subtitles.english: Hoisho. And that was the solo part!

subtitles.original: あれ？みんな、あれ？ご帰宅してんね、一緒に。
subtitles.english: Oh? Everyone, oh? You're joining me, together.

subtitles.original: え、何、何その動き？
subtitles.english: Eh, what, what is that movement?

subtitles.original: 怖い怖い！え、え、どうしたみんな？
subtitles.english: Scary, scary! Eh, eh, what's wrong everyone?

subtitles.original: なんかどこ見てたの？ちゃんと見てくれてた？
subtitles.english: Where were you looking? Were you watching properly?

subtitles.original: ずっと見てたよー！
subtitles.english: We were watching the whole time!

subtitles.original: ずっとここにいたんだよー！
subtitles.english: We were right here!

subtitles.original: うそ、いたの？
subtitles.english: No way, you were?

subtitles.original: 一番近くで見てた。
subtitles.english: We were watching from the closest spot.

subtitles.original: え、そうだったの？
subtitles.english: Eh, really?

subtitles.original: どんだけいたのよ。なんか確かに、なんかちょっと今日多いな、とか思ったけど。
subtitles.english: How many of you were there? I did think there were a lot today.

subtitles.original: ま、ということでですね、ソロパートだったんですけども。
subtitles.english: Well, anyway, that was the solo part.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、ちょっと一人ずつね、改めて感想などなどなどなんですが。
subtitles.english: So, let's hear everyone's thoughts one by one again.

subtitles.original: まつりちゃんの「アンデッド」！
subtitles.english: Matsuri-chan's 'Undead'!

subtitles.original: はい、アンデッドね。やっぱこの雰囲気に合わせて選んだんですけど。
subtitles.english: Yes, 'Undead'. I chose it to match this atmosphere.

subtitles.original: なんか、この歌詞がすごいMVっぽく出してもらってね。
subtitles.english: And the lyrics were displayed like an MV.

subtitles.original: めちゃめちゃ良かった。
subtitles.english: It was so good.

subtitles.original: かっこ可愛く歌えたかな、と思います。
subtitles.english: I think I was able to sing it in a cool and cute way.

subtitles.original: そしてはあちゃま！
subtitles.english: And Haachama!

subtitles.original: はい、はあとと一緒に踊りました、はあと！
subtitles.english: Yes, I danced with 'HAAto', 'HAAto'!

subtitles.original: はあとやばかったよね！
subtitles.english: 'HAAto' was crazy, right!

subtitles.original: すげーキレッキレだった。後ろネタバレててさ。
subtitles.english: She was so sharp. There were spoilers in the back.

subtitles.original: そして新しく出たね、「めちゃゴミ完全食」。みんな、どうだった？
subtitles.english: And the new song, 'Ultra Trash Complete Food'. Everyone, how was it?

subtitles.original: めちゃゴミ完全食、って感じの曲になっております。たくさん聞いてね。
subtitles.english: It's a song that feels like 'Ultra Trash Complete Food'. Please listen to it a lot.

subtitles.original: めっちゃ実写入ってたもんね。
subtitles.english: There were a lot of live-action parts, right.

subtitles.original: ねー！そしてアキちゃん！
subtitles.english: Right! And Aki-chan!

subtitles.original: はい、アキロゼはー、「ローゼ」どうだったー？
subtitles.english: Yes, AkiRose... How was 'ROSE'?

subtitles.original: いや、結構頑張らせてもらったんだけど。
subtitles.english: Well, I worked pretty hard on it.

subtitles.original: すごかった！
subtitles.english: It was amazing!

subtitles.original: 可愛かったよ！進化したわ。
subtitles.english: It was cute! You've evolved.

subtitles.original: さあ、この空間でね、こういう演出をずっと、ずっと、やりたいなと思ってたから。
subtitles.english: Well, I've always, always wanted to do this kind of production in this space.

subtitles.original: ちょうどね、世界観にも合ってるし。ちょっと、すごく頑張りました。
subtitles.english: It fits the world view perfectly. I worked very hard.

subtitles.original: さすがだったよ！
subtitles.english: As expected!

subtitles.original: はい、ありがとう。そして最後に。
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you. And finally.

subtitles.original: はい。最後はね、フブキは「桜のあと」だったんですけど。
subtitles.english: Yes. Finally, for Fubuki, it was 'Sakura no Ato'.

subtitles.original: なんかすこん部がやたら多かったんですけども。
subtitles.english: But there were so many Sukon-bu.

subtitles.original: 一緒にですね、やっぱり白上バンド曲がすごく大好きなので。
subtitles.english: Together, after all, I really love Shirakami band songs.

subtitles.original: こちらの「桜のあと」、歌わせていただきました。本当にありがとうございます、めちゃめちゃ楽しかったです！
subtitles.english: So I sang 'Sakura no Ato'. Thank you so much, it was so much fun!

subtitles.original: ありがとー！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: はい。そしてここからは。
subtitles.english: Yes. And from here...

subtitles.original: ここからはそれぞれが一期生のイメージに合う楽曲を一曲チョイスして、全員で歌うプロデュース曲パートです！
subtitles.english: ...is the produced songs part where we each chose a song that fits the image of the 1st generation, and we all sing together!

subtitles.original: おー！みんな、どんな曲選んだのか、めちゃめちゃ楽しみですね！
subtitles.english: Oh! I'm really looking forward to seeing what songs everyone chose!

subtitles.original: はい。ま、まつりはね、王道かな、っていう曲を選んだんですけど。
subtitles.english: Yes. Well, for Matsuri, I chose a song that's quite orthodox.

subtitles.original: うん。
subtitles.english: Mm-hmm.

subtitles.original: ちゃまはどんな曲？
subtitles.english: What about you, Chama?

subtitles.original: ちゃまは、可愛い、可愛くて仲良しな曲にしました。
subtitles.english: Chama chose a cute, cute song about being close friends.

subtitles.original: 仲良しな曲！
subtitles.english: A song about being close!

subtitles.original: はい。なるほど。
subtitles.english: Yes. I see.

subtitles.original: アキロゼはね、ま、今時感もありつつ、ま、ちょっとダークな、みたいな。
subtitles.english: For AkiRose, well, it has a modern feel, but it's also a bit dark.

subtitles.original: ダーク！
subtitles.english: Dark!

subtitles.original: そういう一面もあるんじゃないかな、みたいなね。
subtitles.english: Like, we have that side too, you know.

subtitles.original: ふーちゃんは？
subtitles.english: What about Fuu-chan?

subtitles.original: 白上はですね、一期生だからこそ染みる曲。
subtitles.english: For Shirakami, it's a song that touches you because we're the 1st generation.

subtitles.original: あー！いい！染みる曲でございます。
subtitles.english: Ah! Nice! It's a touching song.

subtitles.original: はい。ということでですね、皆さんもね、コメントなどで予想して、何が来るかなーとお楽しみに。
subtitles.english: Yes. So, everyone, please look forward to it and try to guess in the comments what's coming.

subtitles.original: お楽しみに！
subtitles.english: Look forward to it!

subtitles.original: じゃ、いきますよ、皆さん。それではプロデュースパート、せーの、スタート！
subtitles.english: Well, here we go, everyone. Now, the produced part, one, two, start!

subtitles.original: 好きか嫌いかなの人間なんて どちらかといえば好きでした
subtitles.english: Humans are either 'like' or 'dislike', and if I had to say, I liked you

subtitles.original: 乗りかかった船を止めちゃうほど 落ちぶれていないよ わかるでしょ
subtitles.english: I'm not so washed up that I'd stop the ship I've already boarded, you know that

subtitles.original: 予想外の嵐も結構です 泥沼で泳ぎ続け人生満喫
subtitles.english: Unexpected storms are fine too, swimming in a quagmire and enjoying life to the fullest

subtitles.original: 行き先なんて二の次なんです キラ付きが透けてるでしょ
subtitles.english: The destination is secondary, your sparkle is showing through, right?

subtitles.original: アクセルしか踏まないよ
subtitles.english: I'll only step on the accelerator
